text.section:
Whenever it appears to the Commissioner that any person is about to engage in any act or practice constituting a violation of any provision of this title or any rule or order under this title, he may in his discretion bring an action to obtain 1 or more of the following remedies:
A temporary restraining order; or
A temporary or permanent injunction.
The Commissioner may not be required to post a bond in any action under this section.
